name: lying-close-grip-biceps-curls-with-cable
title: Lying Close Grip Biceps Curls with Cable
primer: This exercise combines a flat body position with a pulling motion to work the biceps.
steps: Place a flat bench under a cable weight stack and attach a flat bar to the pulley.
Lie down with your head towards the stack and your feet firmly on the floor.
Grasp the bar with yourÂ palms down, about 8 inches apart, and extend your arms straight up.
Curl the bar down in an arc touching your chin.
Slowly return to the starting position.
